tool_description: Multilingual ML-based toxicity profanity moderator for user generated content
name: Detoxify
title: Detoxify

api_list.name: Check toxicity score
api_list.description: calculate toxicity, obscene, identity_attack, insult, threat, sexual_explicit sore for a give text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://detoxify.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "detoxify.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://detoxify.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "detoxify.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
